work.name: iTech Media
work.summary: Development on a full reusable platform using SvelteKit with Typescript & Node.js, with Cloudflare workers hosted on AWS, while using Contentful as the CMS and Tailwind CSS for the frontend. Our in-house developed platform would allow for development speed on websites, full re-theming between them and also give full power to our content team to deliver their ideas to our users within minutes. Prior to that, worked on migrating a legacy PHP (LAMP stack) software to a modern solution using Vue.js with Nuxt and a Serverless architecture with Node.js hosted on AWS.
